Package com.group7.krisefikser.repository

Class HouseholdRepository

java.lang.Object
com.group7.krisefikser.repository.HouseholdRepository
@Repository public class HouseholdRepository extends Object
This class is responsible for interacting with the database to perform CRUD operations related to households. It uses JdbcTemplate to execute SQL queries and manage database connections.

  • Constructor Details

    • HouseholdRepository

      public HouseholdRepository()

  • Method Details

    • createHousehold

      public Long createHousehold(String name, double longitude, double latitude)
      Creates a new household in the database. This method takes the name, longitude, and latitude of the household as parameters, and inserts a new record into the households table.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the household
      longitude - the longitude of the household
      latitude - the latitude of the household
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly created household

    • existsByName

      public boolean existsByName(String householdName)
      Checks if a household with the given name already exists in the database. This method executes a SQL query to count the number of records with the specified name in the households table. If the count is greater than 0, it means the household exists.
      Parameters:
      householdName - the name of the household to check
      Returns:
      true if the household exists, false otherwise

    • save

      public Household save(Household household)
      Saves a new Household to the database.
      Parameters:
      household - the Household object to save
      Returns:
      the saved Household object with the generated ID

    • getHouseholdByName

      public Optional<Household> getHouseholdByName(String name)
      Retrieves a Household by its name from the database.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the household to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Household object with the specified name

    • getHouseholdById

      public Optional<Household> getHouseholdById(Long id)
      Retrieves a Household by its ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the household to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Household object with the specified ID

    • addHouseholdToGroup

      public void addHouseholdToGroup(long householdId, long groupId)
      Updates the household ID of a user in the database. This method is used to associate a user with a specific household.
      Parameters:
      householdId - the ID of the household to associate with the user
      groupId - the ID of the group to associate with the user

    • findMembersByHouseholdId

      public List<HouseholdMemberResponse> findMembersByHouseholdId(Long householdId)
      Finds all user members of a specific household.
      Parameters:
      householdId - the ID of the household
      Returns:
      a list of HouseholdMemberResponse objects

    • findNonUserMembersByHouseholdId

      public List<NonUserMemberResponse> findNonUserMembersByHouseholdId(Long householdId)
      Finds all non-user members of a specific household.
      Parameters:
      householdId - the ID of the household
      Returns:
      a list of NonUserMemberResponse objects
